author: cmpilato
msg: More work in issue #2953.  Change the way merge source normalization
happens to account for the annoyance that given a segment of path FOO
and revision coverage from N to M (inclusive), you can't actually do
anything useful unless you expand the range to N-1 (exclusive) to M
(inclusive), and path location for N-1 (which might not be FOO, but
perhaps is whatever FOO was copied from in rN).
Sadly, I'm having trouble figuring out what to do with gaps in the
history, so this code remains dead at the moment.  :-(
(normalize_merge_sources): Add 'ctx' parameter, and rework this function
to fetch segment locations in full, combine those with the ranges,

author: cmpilato
msg: Reverse the ordering of svn_client__repos_location_segments()'s results.

author: glasser
msg: In test suite, pass default --username and --password to any 'svn'
invocation that doesn't already have it.
(_with_auth): New function, adding --username/--password to its args

author: glasser
msg: Make the command-line client accept the "auth" options (username,
password, no-auth-cache, non-interactive) for *all* subcommands, even
those which don't currently require authentication or aren't
This allows wrapper scripts to pass these arguments to every
invocation of svn.  This both simplifies their job, and
"future-proofs" them --- they can happily pass '--non-interactive' to
every invocation even if it's not currently possible for the
